title: ntn.gps Request Application Programming Interface (API) Schema
description: Determines whether a Notecard should override a paired Starnote's GPS/GNSS location with its own GPS/GNSS location. The paired Starnote uses its own GPS/GNSS location by default.

on.description: When `true`, a Starnote will use the GPS/GNSS location from its paired Notecard, instead of its own GPS/GNSS location.

off.description: When `true`, a paired Starnote will use its own GPS/GNSS location. This is the default configuration.

samples.title: Enable Notecard GPS Override
samples.description: Configure Starnote to use the paired Notecard's GPS/GNSS location.

samples.title: Use Starnote's Own GPS
samples.description: Configure Starnote to use its own GPS/GNSS location (default).
